__TOC__

<nowiki>[[..-..-Personas-Alice]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[..-..-Personas-House]]</nowiki> update an existing application, and publish the new version.  <nowiki>[[..-..-Personas-Mike]]</nowiki> gets the update on his device.

== Primary story ==

# <nowiki>[[..-..-Personas-Alice]]</nowiki> fixes a bug in one of her existing apps.  After verifying the fix, she creates and signs a new package.
# <nowiki>[[..-..-Personas-Alice]]</nowiki> signs in to the app store and uploads the new package.
# <nowiki>[[..-..-Personas-Mike]]</nowiki>'s device discovers that an updated version of the app is available, and asks <nowiki>[[..-..-Personas-Mike]]</nowiki> if it should be downloaded and installed.
# <nowiki>[[..-..-Personas-Mike]]</nowiki> confirms, and the download begins.
# When the download finishes, the updated is installed, keeping all of his old data in place.
